p: The mean and standard deviations of the physico-chemical properties of the honey samples are shown in Table 2. The average major sugars: sucrose, glucose and fructose contents of the honey samples were 3.7 ± 0.9, 30.3 ± 2.5 & 37.1 ± 2.6 respectively and the results are closer to the reports of Ouchemoukh et al., 2010, Nuru et al., 2017. The mean of EC, acidity, mineral (ash) content and pH values of the honey samples were 0.5 ± 0.14, 27.0 ± 3.07, 0.4 ± 0.15 & 3.8 ± 0.25 respectively and the results are within the values reported by Saxena et al., 2010, Feás et al., 2010.
